content.rendered:
Get the money
you need today

  • Personal loans up to $10,0001
  • Apply with NO impact to your credit score2
  • Apply online or in-branch
  • Same day funding
Apply Now (Won’t affect your credit score!)

1Loan amounts vary by state

2For the initial purposes of pre-qualifying you for a loan, we will use credit information from one or more Credit Reporting Agencies. This information is pulled using a “soft” credit inquiry, which does not impact your credit score. If you are approved for and accept the loan, we will obtain a complete Consumer Credit Report from one or more Credit Reporting Agencies; this request for a credit report will result in a “hard” credit inquiry and may impact your credit score.

50,000+ reviews
4.9 score

1Loan amounts vary by state

2For the initial purposes of pre-qualifying you for a loan, we will use credit information from one or more Credit Reporting Agencies. This information is pulled using a “soft” credit inquiry, which does not impact your credit score. If you are approved for and accept the loan, we will obtain a complete Consumer Credit Report from one or more Credit Reporting Agencies; this request for a credit report will result in a “hard” credit inquiry and may impact your credit score.

Check installment loan amounts available where you live

  • Alabama
  • Illinois
  • Missouri
  • Nevada
  • New Mexico
  • Oklahoma
  • Texas

Loan amount: $XXX – $XXX

Apply now

It’s easy to apply for a up to $10,0001

Check the loan limits in your state in seconds

Apply online or in-branch with NO credit score impact2

Get your money fast with same-day funding

Apply Online
Contact Us
4.9
Google rating
7
States served
200+
Local branches
387,000+
Loans made last year

Google reviews from our customers

We’re committed to providing trustworthy guidance and amazing service. Our 50,000+ positive reviews and 4.9 Google rating show the difference it makes.

Timothy Heidecker

Returning customer. They always have great and speedy service and friendly staff ready to assist. Always my go to when we need a little help especially during these times.

Rachele Cobb

Kenny was very helpful and friendly! He called me by name instead of just mam. I have never felt more welcome in a place as I was in his office today! I would recommend them to anyone who needed a little financial help!! Thanks for a great experience

Tiffany

In a world where GREAT customer service is hard to find, this company deserves a tremendous amount of praise and admiration. Thank you for being awesome and making a stressful situation less tense! You rock!

Joel Ixtacop

Amazing customer service. Everything was explained too me and the process was quick . The application process was very simple . I will be a customer with Sunloan for a long time

Brittany Nicole Johnson

I came in and they helped me with what I needed and got me out the door quick! Letizia was amazing and very informative. They offer tax information and it’s great to know the offers they gave! Online payment is the best, which they offer!

John Blakey

The staff are very friendly and professional while helping me get the loan approved and money in my pocket today!

Sophia Martinez

Picked up my loan today very fast process. From the phone process to the in person service Mrs.Izquierdo is very professional and curteous!

Apply now with NO credit score impact2

Get same-day approval and fast funding–typically in less than one hour!3

Get Started

We offer Tax Services year-round

Get your money faster with a Tax Refund Advance up to $7,0004

offers year-round tax preparation. We’ll make sure your filing is 100% accurate and that you get the biggest refund possible.

  • Start your filing online, in person, or with a local branch drop-off
  • Count on expert support and 20+ years of experience 
  • Dependents file for free when you file with us
Learn More

1Loan amounts vary by state. State limits for minimum and maximum loan amount subject to change.2For the initial purposes of pre-qualifying you for a loan, we will use credit information from one or more Credit Reporting Agencies. This information is pulled using a “soft” credit inquiry, which does not impact your credit score. If you are approved for and accept the loan, we will obtain a complete Consumer Credit Report from one or more Credit Reporting Agencies; this request for a credit report will result in a “hard” credit inquiry and may impact your credit score. 3Same-day approval dependent on when application is submitted. Call center hours are Monday-Friday from 8 am – 7 pm CT, and Saturday from 8:30 am – 2:30 pm CT. 1-800-SUN-LOAN. 4Offer valid from January 2, 2025 – February 28, 2025. This is a loan and contingent on bank approval.
